OH MY GOD HOW HAS NOBODY ANSWERED THIS  PROFANITY FILTER IT SUCKS

It not just Profanity. I should be able to name my villagers and farm animals with any name I want. For some reason I cant even give a villager a real world name if it close to a public figures name or a celebrity's name. News flash Microsoft, multiple people can have the exact same name. In fact my real name match a comic book characters no hero name down to the exact same middle name so I cant even name a villager after myself. Just stupid.

Minecraft isn't a kid's game, there are adults who play and enjoy this game. I don't see the problem if I want to build a Bar and name potions after drinks. It's so invigorating not being able to give a potion a clever name because Minecraft thinks the word tequila is profane. I understand people can be immature and post gross stuff in servers or whatever, but there should be some fairground for players of all ages. The profanity filter as an option should have already been implemented.

I tried to name an item after a private teacher I have at my university on a bedrock realm with several of my peers. The professor is very nice, but unfortunately, her name is Dr. Bish, and it was censored. Of course, everyone on the server was thinking of the same person in a non-joking manner, and all of us are of a mature age. I believe it would be highly beneficial to allow realm owners to turn the profanity setting off for their realm, or for individual users to disable it through a parental setting, similar to how you can with Java realms. Also, with naming items, the profanity filter does not take effect until AFTER you name the item, which may cause some players to unknowingly waste experience points. This happened to me when naming my item in this case, and I had to use the extra experience to rename it to something else.

This is an old post but yes please give adult accounts an option to disable it on Bedrock Realms, just like with Java. I literally own the realm and everyone on it is an adult so we really don't need the realm to filter over our conversations.

To add, we also have to use discord to talk because the chat censors pretty much everything and it even wrongly suspended one of our members. If your chat system is so bad that people have to find alternatives then that's a sign it either needs to be fixed, or there needs to be more options for everyone's experience.

The only reason I came on the feedback website is because I can only add servers through changing my DNS settings on my Xbox. The problem is, it affects all accounts on the device and my sister just wants to play on Hive BE, but it a.) adds ~30 seconds to the login time (even on a series X) and b.) it always puts her in the Europe region for whatever reason, even though my family lives in North America. She hates this, but I have to restart my console every time I want to change the DNS to play on my friend's server so it's a huge inconvenience. MOJANG, ADD THIS! WE CAN DO IT ON POCKET AND PC, SO WHY DO YOU SEEM TO HATE CONSOLE?!?!

I would rather there be 4D skins allowed

Here's how to do this:

  1. Download blockbench or use the web app
  2. Select "Create Minecraft Skin"
  3. Click "Create"
  4. MAKE SURE TO TURN OFF "Pose" IF THE SKIN IS POSED DURING EXPORT, IT WILL RENDER INCORRECTLY
  5. Under "File" click "Convert Project"
  6. Convert it to "Bedrock Entity"
  7. Modify the skin to your liking (9 heads, hole in the chest, 177 arms, 38.5 legs, etc.)
  8. Under "File" chose "Export as Bedrock Geometry"
  9. After the export is done open Minecraft Bedrock
  10. Click "Profile"
  11. Click "Edit Character"
  12. Click "Owned"
  13. Click "Choose New Skin"
  14. Open the "model.geo.json" File in your downloads folder
  15. Choose either "Wide" or "Slim"

I once had this idea way back on the ps3 where you could build the whole world i started out with a flat world and started with building all the terrain mountains and ect. I had a huge mountain directly in the middle of map that went clear into the clouds had huge cliffs coming down with a couple waterfalls spruce biome on top of huge mountain had underground rivers and made my own underground lava lakes and was building the underground caves it was a couple friends and I that was building it we gotten so far was looking like a legit world from ground zero had every biome placing ores diamonds coal iron ect. throughout the world like a normal map you'd play on but was human generated . my plan was to eventually start it up as a server for folks to join and play it like a legit map was sooo5 far into that build but then most terrible thing happened . my ps3 got corrupted and lost everything is was EPIC ! I should of been smart and put it on a flashdrive cus back then you could save them on flash drives and reload it back on to system but yeah I was a dummy and lost it . I literally cried!!! I could of have mojang put it up for a realm / server and possibly could of have people to pay a couple bucks to join the realm or have a copy of it maaaaaan was sooooo so epic now I am tearing up again from it ooof
